initConfig:
tinymce.init({
  plugins: 'autoresize lists advlist table directionality codesample nonbreaking',
  toolbar: 'undo redo ' +
        'alignleft aligncenter alignright alignjustify ' +
        'indent outdent ' +
        'numlist bullist ' +
        'table ' +
        'ltr rtl ' +
        'codesample',
  height: 360
});
